testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: When I click "All Content Types" in the "Current Class" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: Then I click the Search button in the "All Content Types" column and verify the Search filters are visible inside column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: When I set the "Information Fields" dropdown to "Question Style" in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: Then I verify that selected information fields are "visible" in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: And verify that "[Demo] Free Body Diagram" is visible in the Search results in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: When I discard the Information Fields "Question Style" search filter in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "All Content Types" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: And I verify that selected information fields are "invisible" in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: And verify that "[Demo] True/False" is visible in the Search results in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Information Fields filter can be set and discarded
